Description:
Hair Regrowth Oil is an authentic ayurvedic concoction of more than 40 herbs and naturals base oils and essential oils. It helps to control hair fall, promotes hair re-growth, helps reverse years of baldness as well.
It has ingredients like Bramhi, Amla, Genugreek, Kalongi, Jatamashi, Bringaraj blended with Rosemary, Camphor and other beneficial 100% natural essntial oils and base oils.

This oil is blended with Castor, Sesame as base oils and contains various heating herbs (nutmeg, nagarmotha, turmeric, garlic extracts etc)  which provide healing properties arising due to arthritis, sciatica, spondylitis, back pain or any kind of body pain. 
As per ayurveda, pain without injury is mostly related to "Vata imbalances" - meaning disturbance of air in the body. 
In order to get best results - the oil should be massaged in a gentle manner at the impacted areas for few minutes (until it penetrates into the skin). Try and cover the impacted area as it promotes heat. Regular use for few days starts to show improvement.
In general, always massage your body with pure oils regularly to avoid "Vata imbalance" and its side effects like body pain.

Description:
Premature Graying has become a widespread issue these days due to various reasons. In this condition, hair pigmentation is impacted resulting in partial/complete hair graying. Multiple factors have been known to contribute. As per Ayurveda, Pitta Imbalance along with Vitamin D deficiency have known to contribute extensively. 
Premature Graying Control Hair Oil has been blended with Ayurvedic herbs, roots (including Ridge Gourd extract, Amla, bringaraj and few others) to cure this problem.
Oil should be massaged gently on the Scalp for few minutes and should be left for 2 hours or so before cleaning. Any natural/herbal shampoo can be used to clean hair. Oil is safe to be applied overnight as well.
Slowly this oil will start showing results with hair portion near the scalp getting the black color(pigmentation).
The oil has been manufactured keeping Tridoshic balancing properties - This can be used by any body type (Vata, Pitta, Kapha body) and does not have shown any side effects.
NOTE - In general, its advisable to patch test the Oil to check if there it suits an individuals body type.
Blended with Almond and Jojoba in equal proportions and soothing 100% natural essential oils - this promotes skin hydration and nourishment alike. Very good for winters to keep dryness in control.

This is a blend of 100% natural wood pressed oils and naturally extracted essential oils. Blended with Almond, Jojoba, Sesame seed oils and Kashmir Lavender, Chamomile, Patchouli essential oils - it provides hydration, nourishment and soothes child skin. All the ingredients are edible hence safe to apply on new born children. Given the properties and its benefits, this blended oil is popular amongst the adults as well.

Hair oil/serum is great for promoting hair shine, thickness and nourishment.

Description:
Black Mustard is a pungent and aromatic oil, widely grown and used in North India. It has a near ideal Omega3: Omega6, which makes it a good choice for regular use. Use it for delicious dry Indian vegetables.
It has a high smoke point of 260 degrees centigrade. Rich in MUFA and PUFA, hence it is good for HDL.
Mindful use of mustard oil helps to reduce risk of cardiovascular diseases. Mustard has anti microbial, anti fungal properties. Regular massage with mustard oil can be extremely beneficial for vata imbalance thereby reducing body pains, regulating body temperature and maintaining a healthy nervous system.
Wood Pressed Black Mustard has a long shelf life, which is why it is used in Pickles. Have you tried pickles in cold pressed black mustard?
